result.eng: How many bedrooms do you need?
result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait

result.html: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?

result.eng: There are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
result.ga: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite ann
result.orig: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite ann
result.html: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite annThere are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
result.ponchtml: Tá trí ẛeomra codlata cisteanaċ agus seomra suite annThere are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.

result.eng: And the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ga: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.orig: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.html: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ponchtml: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folcṫa ar ḋeisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.

result.eng: There are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ga: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.orig: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.html: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ẛeomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-ṁórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.

result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá ann
result.orig: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá ann
result.html: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá annHow many bedrooms are there?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra codlata atá annHow many bedrooms are there?

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ga: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.orig: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.html: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ponchtml: Luiġ Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular ṫit néal ar biṫ codlata uirṫiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.html: Slán codlata agaibhGood-bye and good night.
result.ponchtml: Slán codlata agaiḃGood-bye and good night.

result.eng: It's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ga: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibh
